settings.title: Who We Are
settings.content:
Shenzhen AtomStack Technologies Co., Ltd. is at the forefront of creating intelligent products, with a specific focus on DIY Laser Engravers and Infrared Lasers. Our dedication lies in enhancing product capabilities, particularly in ensuring precision and efficiency. At AtomStack, our mission is to empower DIY enthusiasts and creators with tools that ensure both efficiency and unparalleled quality in their endeavors.

While lasers were prevalent in the military, medical, and industrial sectors back then, consumer-grade products in this niche were scarce. Parallelly, the digital tech era was booming, ushering in a wave of digital creative concepts. Bridging digital technology with tangible creation, and catering to the challenges faced by the creative community, became our driving force. This passion led to the birth of the AtomStack brand, where we poured extensive resources into R&D, developing state-of-the-art engraving machines, infrared lasers, and 3D printers.

Since our inception in 2020, our commitment has remained unshaken. With a customer-first approach, we continuously refine both our hardware and software. Our relentless pursuit of enhancing the efficiency and precision of engraving machines aims to elevate businesses, personalize home life, and bring the visions of DIY enthusiasts and artists to life.

settings.title: First SLA 3D printer
settings.content: In 2014, the founding team of Atomstack established Dazzle, the first SLA 3D printer brand in China, and developed Xiaofang, the first semiconductor laser SLA 3D printer in China. The launch of those products has laid the foundation for in-depth research and development of semiconductor lasers in the future.

settings.title: A Year of Excellence, A Legacy of Success
settings.content:
The initial launch of the Atomstack A5 series laser engravers marked a significant milestone. Within just one year, the A5 20W and A5 Pro 40W models have garnered unparalleled popularity, establishing themselves as top choices in the Laser Engraver category.

Our company has registered the brand AtomStack in the US, UK, European Union, Japan, and China.

settings.title: Comprehensive Product Lineup
settings.content: In 2021, we proudly introduced the AtomStack A10 Pro. Furthermore, we have dedicated our efforts to crafting a diverse range of laser engraver accessories, including rollers, laser modules, honeycomb working panels, extension kits, and more.

settings.title: Groundbreaking Releases
settings.content: We proudly launched the groundbreaking AtomStack A20 Pro and A30 Pro, the world's inaugural 20W, 33W dual-laser engraving and cutting machine. They represent a significant achievement not just for our brand, but for the entire laser engraving industry.

settings.title: First Fiber Laser Module
settings.content: Armed with years of technological know-how and fueled by meaningful interactions with our users, we've boldly ventured into crafting our inaugural fiber laser engraver. This move isn't just a leap, it's a laser-sharp sprint into broader horizons to cater to an even larger family of users. We're keeping the flag of affordability and top-notch value flying high. With this new venture, we're not just engraving materials, we're etching our commitment to providing products that pack a punch without punching a hole in your wallet!
